revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== Imitative, perhaps from/suggested by {{m|en|yap}}/{{m|en|yammer}} + {{m|en|chatter}}.<ref>{{R:Dictionary.com|passage=1865â€“70; perhaps ya(p) + (cha)tter}}</ref><ref>{{R:Lexico|passage=Early 19th century imitative, perhaps suggested by yammer and chatter.|nodot=1}}</ref><ref>{{R:Merriam-Webster Online|passage=probably from YAP entry 1 + ''-ter'' (as in ''chatter'')}}</ref> ===Noun=== {{en-noun|~}} # [[natter|Natter]]; [[prattle]]; mindless [[chatter]]. ====Synonyms==== * See also [[Thesaurus:chatter]] ===Verb=== {{en-verb}} # To [[natter]]; to [[prattle]]; to [[chatter]] mindlessly. ===See also=== * [[yada yada yada]] ===References=== <references/> ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=aertty|attery|treaty}} [[Category:English 2-syllable words]] [[Category:en:Talking]]
